alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 20 at 5:58PM PST until December 21 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: Updated Oregon zones 014,015,016 and Washington zones 045, 046 (Gorge and Upper Hood River.) ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
